history.proof: intros m x y x' y' m1 m2 Hinv Hx_1_y Hnot_expf_x'_1_y' Hexpf_x_1_y Hexpf_x'_1_y'. unfold m1, m2. rewrite nf_L0L0_I with m x y x' y'; auto. - shelve. - shelve. - shelve.

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall (m : fmap) (x y x' y' : dart), let m1 := L (L m zero x y) zero x' y' in let m2 := L (L m zero x' y') zero x y in inv_hmap m1 -> let x_1 := cA_1 m one x in let x'_1 := cA_1 m one x' in expf m x_1 y -> ~ expf m x'_1 y' -> expf (L m zero x' y') x_1 y -> expf (L m zero x y) x'_1 y' -> nf m1 = nf m2

Premises:
Inductive fmap : Set := V : fmap | I : fmap -> dart -> tag -> point -> fmap | L : fmap -> dim -> dart -> dart -> fmap
nf = fix nf (m : fmap) : Z := match m with | V => 0%Z | I m0 _ _ _ => (nf m0 + 1)%Z | L m0 zero x y => let x_1 := cA_1 m0 one x in (nf m0 + (if expf_dec m0 x_1 y then 1 else -1))%Z | L m0 one x y => let y0 := cA m0 zero y in (nf m0 + (if expf_dec m0 x y0 then 1 else -1))%Z end : fmap -> Z
inv_hmap = fix inv_hmap (m : fmap) : Prop := match m with | V => True | I m0 x _ _ => inv_hmap m0 /\ prec_I m0 x | L m0 k0 x y => inv_hmap m0 /\ prec_L m0 k0 x y end : fmap -> Prop
cA_1 = fix cA (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart) {struct m} : dart := match m with | V => nil | I m0 x _ _ => if eq_dart_dec x z then z else cA m0 k z | L m0 k0 x y => if eq_dim_dec k0 k then if eq_dart_dec x z then y else if eq_dart_dec (cA_1 m0 k y) z then cA m0 k x else cA m0 k z else cA m0 k z end with cA_1 (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart) {struct m} : dart := match m with | V => nil | I m0 x _ _ => if eq_dart_dec x z then z else cA_1 m0 k z | L m0 k0 x y => if eq_dim_dec k0 k then if eq_dart_dec y
expf = fun (m : fmap) (x y : dart) => inv_hmap m /\ MF.expo m x y : fmap -> dart -> dart -> Prop
Inductive dim : Set := zero : dim | one : dim
dart = nat : Set
nf_L0L0_I : forall (m : fmap) (x y x' y' : dart), let m1 := L (L m zero x y) zero x' y' in let m2 := L (L m zero x' y') zero x y in inv_hmap m1 -> let x_1 := cA_1 m one x in let x'_1 := cA_1 m one x' in expf m x_1 y -> expf m x'_1 y' -> expf (L m zero x' y') x_1 y -> ~ expf (L m zero x y) x'_1 y' -> nf m1 = nf m2
inv_hmap_L0L1 : forall (m : fmap) (x y x' y' : dart), let m1 := L (L m zero x y) one x' y' in let m2 := L (L m one x' y') zero x y in inv_hmap m1 -> inv_hmap m2
inv_hmap_L0L0 : forall (m : fmap) (x y x' y' : dart), let m1 := L (L m zero x y) zero x' y' in let m2 := L (L m zero x' y') zero x y in inv_hmap m1 -> inv_hmap m2
B0_L1_L0 : forall (m : fmap) (x y x' y' : dart), let m1 := L (L m zero x y) one x' y' in inv_hmap m1 -> B m1 zero x = L m one x' y'
B1_L0_L1 : forall (m : fmap) (x y x' y' : dart), let m1 := L (L m one x y) zero x' y' in inv_hmap m1 -> B m1 one x = L m zero x' y'
B0_L0_L0 : forall (m : fmap) (x y x' y' : dart), let m1 := L (L m zero x y) zero x' y' in inv_hmap m1 -> B m1 zero x = L m zero x' y'
expf_expf_L0_3_bis : forall (m : fmap) (x y z : dart), inv_hmap (L m zero x y) -> let x0 := cA m zero x in let x_1 := cA_1 m one x in ~ expf m x_1 y -> expf m x_1 z -> expf (L m zero x y) x_1 z
expf_L1_II_CNA_aux : forall (m : fmap) (x y z : dart) (i : nat), let m1 := L m one x y in let y0 := cA m zero y in let m2 := L m one x y in let t := Iter (cF m2) i z in inv_hmap m2 -> exd m z -> expf m x y0 -> ~ expf m x z -> expf (L m one x y) z t -> expf m z t
expf_not_expf_L0_CV : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart), inv_hmap (L m zero x y) -> let x_1 := cA_1 m one x in let x0 := cA m zero x in expf (L m zero x y) y x0 -> ~ expf m x_1 y
not_expf_expf_L0_CN : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart), inv_hmap (L m zero x y) -> let x_1 := cA_1 m one x in let x0 := cA m zero x in ~ expf m x_1 y -> expf (L m zero x y) y x0
expf_expf_L0_4_bis_prel : forall (m : fmap) (x y z : dart), inv_hmap (L m zero x y) -> let x_1 := cA_1 m one x in let y_0 := cA_1 m zero y in let y_0_1 := cA_1 m one y_0 in ~ expf m x_1 y -> expf m y_0_1 z -> expf (L m zero x y) y_0_1 z
expf_expf_L0_4_bis : forall (m : fmap) (x y z : dart), inv_hmap (L m zero x y) -> let x_1 := cA_1 m one x in ~ expf m x_1 y -> expf m y z -> expf (L m zero x y) y z
between_expf_L0_3 : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart) (i : nat), inv_hmap (L m zero x y) -> let x0 := cA m zero x in let x_1 := cA_1 m one x in let z := Iter (cF m) i x_1 in ~ expf m x_1 y -> betweenf m x_1 z x0 -> expf (L m zero x y) x_1 z
expf_not_expf_L0 : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart), inv_hmap (L m zero x y) -> let x_1 := cA_1 m one x in let x0 := cA m zero x in expf m x_1 y < -> ~ expf (L m zero x y) y x0
expf_L0_6 : forall (m : fmap) (x y z t : dart), inv_hmap (L m zero x y) -> exd m z -> let x_1 := cA_1 m one x in ~ expf m x_1 y -> ~ expf m x_1 z -> ~ expf m y t -> expf m z t -> expf (L m zero x y) z t
expf_expf_L0_2_bis : forall (m : fmap) (x y z t : dart), inv_hmap (L m zero x y) -> exd m z -> let x_1 := cA_1 m one x in ~ expf m x_1 y -> ~ expf m x_1 z -> ~ expf m y z -> expf m z t -> expf (L m zero x y) z t
expf_L0_y_x_1 : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart), inv_hmap (L m zero x y) -> let x_1 := cA_1 m one x in expf (L m zero x y) y x_1
expf_expf_L0_1 : forall (m : fmap) (x y z : dart) (i : nat), inv_hmap (L m zero x y) -> exd m z -> let x_1 := cA_1 m one x in let t := Iter (cF m) i z in expf m x_1 y -> ~ expf m x_1 z -> expf (L m zero x y) z t
expf_expf_L0_2 : forall (m : fmap) (x y z : dart) (i : nat), inv_hmap (L m zero x y) -> exd m z -> let x_1 := cA_1 m one x in ~ expf m x_1 y -> ~ expf m x_1 z -> ~ expf m y z -> let t := Iter (cF m) i z in expf (L m zero x y) z t
degree_L1_split : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart), let m1 := L m one x y in let y0 := cA m zero y in let y_1 := cA_1 m one y in inv_hmap (L m one x y) -> expf m x y0 -> MF.degree m x = MF.degree m1 x + MF.degree m1 y_1
expf_L0_5 : forall (m : fmap) (x y z t : dart), inv_hmap (L m zero x y) -> exd m z -> let x_1 := cA_1 m one x in ~ expf m x_1 y -> expf m x_1 z /\ expf m y t \/ expf m x_1 t /\ expf m y z -> expf (L m zero x y) z t
expf_L0_5bis : forall (m : fmap) (x y z t : dart), inv_hmap (L m zero x y) -> exd m z -> let x_1 := cA_1 m one x in ~ expf m x_1 y -> expf m x_1 z /\ expf m x_1 t \/ expf m y z /\ expf m y t -> expf (L m zero x y) z t
between_expf_L0_4_prel : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart) (i : nat), inv_hmap (L m zero x y) -> let x_1 := cA_1 m one x in let y_0 := cA_1 m zero y in let y_0_1 := cA_1 m one y_0 in let z := Iter (cF m) i y_0_1 in ~ expf m x_1 y -> betweenf m y_0_1 z y -> expf (L m zero x y) y_0_1 z
between_expf_L0_1 : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart) (i : nat), inv_hmap (L m zero x y) -> let x_1 := cA_1 m one x in let z := Iter (cF m) i x_1 in betweenf m x_1 z y -> expf (L m zero x y) x_1 z
expf_L0_CN_2 : forall (m : fmap) (x y z : dart) (i : nat), inv_hmap (L m zero x y) -> exd m z -> let x0 := cA m zero x in let x_1 := cA_1 m one x in let y_0 := cA_1 m zero y in let y_0_1 := cA_1 m one y_0 in let t := Iter (cF (L m zero x y)) i z in ~ expf m x_1 y -> expf m z t \/ expf m z y /\ expf m t x0 \/ expf m t y /\ expf m z x0
expf_L1_x : forall (m : fmap) (x y z : dart), let y0 := cA m zero y in let m1 := L m one x y in inv_hmap m1 -> ~ expf m x y0 -> expf m x z -> expf m1 x z
expf_L0_CN_1 : forall (m : fmap) (x y z : dart) (i : nat), inv_hmap (L m zero x y) -> exd m z -> let x0 := cA m zero x in let x_1 := cA_1 m one x in let y_0 := cA_1 m zero y in let y_0_1 := cA_1 m one y_0 in let t := Iter (cF (L m zero x y)) i z in expf m x_1 y -> betweenf m x_1 z y /\ betweenf m x_1 t y \/ betweenf m y_0_1 z x0 /\ betweenf m y_0_1 t x0 \/ ~ expf m x_1 z /\ expf m z t
between_expf_L0 : forall (m : fmap) (x y z t : dart), inv_hmap (L m zero x y) -> let x_1 := cA_1 m one x in let y_0_1 := cF m y in let x0 := cA m zero x in betweenf m x_1 z y /\ betweenf m x_1 t y \/ betweenf m y_0_1 z x0 /\ betweenf m y_0_1 t x0 -> expf (L m zero x y) z t
expf_L1_x_y0 : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart), let m1 := L m one x y in let y0 := cA m zero y in inv_hmap m1 -> ~ expf m x y0 -> expf m1 x y0
not_expf_L1_x_y0 : forall (m : fmap) (x y z : dart), dart -> inv_hmap (L m one x y) -> exd m z -> let y0 := cA m zero y in let y_1 := cA_1 m one y in expf m x y0 -> ~ expf (L m one x y) x y_1
expf_L0_CS : forall (m : fmap) (x y z t : dart), inv_hmap (L m zero x y) -> exd m z -> let x0 := cA m zero x in let x_1 := cA_1 m one x in let y_0 := cA_1 m zero y in let y_0_1 := cA_1 m one y_0 in (if expf_dec m x_1 y then betweenf m x_1 z y /\ betweenf m x_1 t y \/ betweenf m y_0_1 z x0 /\ betweenf m y_0_1 t x0 \/ ~ expf m x_1 z /\ expf m z t else expf m x_1 z /\ expf m y t \/ expf m x_1 t /\ expf m y z \/ expf m z t) -> expf (L m zero x y) z t
expf_L1_II_CNA : forall (m : fmap) (x y z t : dart), inv_hmap (L m one x y) -> exd m z -> let x1 := cA m one x in let x10 := cA m zero x1 in let y0 := cA m zero y in let y_1 := cA_1 m one y in expf m x y0 -> expf (L m one x y) z t -> ~ expf m x z -> expf m z t
expf_not_orbit_x : forall (m : fmap) (x y z t : dart), inv_hmap (L m one x y) -> exd m z -> let x1 := cA m one x in let x10 := cA m zero x1 in let y0 := cA m zero y in let y_1 := cA_1 m one y in expf m x y0 -> ~ expf m x z -> expf m z t -> expf (L m one x y) z t
expf_impl_expf_L1 : forall (m : fmap) (x y z t : dart), let m1 := L m one x y in let y0 := cA m zero y in inv_hmap m1 -> ~ expf m x y0 -> ~ expf m x z -> ~ expf m y0 t -> expf m z t -> expf m1 z t
expf_L1_y0 : forall (m : fmap) (x y z : dart), let y0 := cA m zero y in let m1 := L m one x y in inv_hmap m1 -> ~ expf m x y0 -> expf m y0 z -> expf m1 y0 z
BinIntDef.Z.add = fun x y : Z => match x with | 0%Z => y | Z.pos x' => match y with | 0%Z => x | Z.pos y' => Z.pos (x' + y') | Z.neg y' => BinIntDef.Z.pos_sub x' y' end | Z.neg x' => match y with | 0%Z => x | Z.pos y' => BinIntDef.Z.pos_sub y' x' | Z.neg y' => Z.neg (x' + y') end end : Z -> Z -> Z Argument scopes are [Z_scope Z_scope]
cF_L0_1 : forall (m : fmap) (x y z : dart), inv_hmap (L m zero x y) -> let x_1 := cA_1 m one x in betweenf m x_1 z y -> cF (L m zero x y) z = (if eq_dart_dec y z then x_1 else cF m z)
expf_L0_CN : forall (m : fmap) (x y z t : dart), inv_hmap (L m zero x y) -> exd m z -> expf (L m zero x y) z t -> let x0 := cA m zero x in let x_1 := cA_1 m one x in let y_0 := cA_1 m zero y in let y_0_1 := cA_1 m one y_0 in if expf_dec m x_1 y then betweenf m x_1 z y /\ betweenf m x_1 t y \/ betweenf m y_0_1 z x0 /\ betweenf m y_0_1 t x0 \/ ~ expf m x_1 z /\ expf m z t else expf m z t \/ expf m z y /\ expf m t x0 \/ expf m t y /\ expf m z x0
expf_L1_eq : forall (m : fmap) (x y z t : dart), let m1 := L m one x y in let y0 := cA m zero y in inv_hmap m1 -> ~ expf m x y0 -> ~ expf m x z -> ~ expf m y0 z -> expf m1 z t < -> expf m z t
expf_B0_CS_2_a_I : forall (m : fmap) (x z t : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m zero x -> let x0 := cA m zero x in let x_1 := cA_1 m one x in let xb0 := bottom m zero x in let xh0 := top m zero x in let xh0_1 := cA_1 m one xh0 in ~ expf m x0 xb0 -> expf m x_1 z -> expf m x_1 t -> expf (B m zero x) z t

``` 
intros m x y x' y' m1 m2 Hinv Hx_1_y Hnot_expf_x'_1_y' Hexpf_x_1_y Hexpf_x'_1_y'. unfold m1, m2. rewrite nf_L0L0_I with m x y x' y'; auto.
